divs: Sighting Details We were standing outside in our driveway lookingat the stars and current planet alignment, when my wife noticed what firstappeared to be two bright star-like objects moving through the sky. Calling myattention to them, we observed the objects move at a high rate of speed fromsouthwest to northeast maintaining formation throughout. The lead object was ata slightly lower altitude (estimated to be about 1-2 thousand feet, andmaintained a lead of about 1-2 thousand feet throughout the sighting. Theobjects made no sound whatsoever. I have been an aviation enthusiast and amatueraviation historian for over 30 years, and consider this event to be outside therealm of conventional aircraft performance. The objects faded from view into thedistant northeastern horizon.
trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Henderson
There were no other sightings in Henderson on or around May 7th 2002
Summary: SILENT STEADY LIGHTS FLYING IN FORMATION
